string-array.name: sms_tempalte
string-array.item: Hi, this is your UniUni Delivery driver. I have a parcel for you and will be delivering it to you. Are you home?
Hi, this is your UniUni delivery driver. I have delivered your parcel at: mailroom
Hi, This is your UniUni delivery driver. I have a parcel for you. Please call or message me to arrange for delivery. Thank you!
Hi, This is your UniUni delivery driver. I have a parcel for you but could not reach you.
